1.title: Delahaye Fever
1.plot: A chrome malfunction dashes Dave and Larry's dreams of showing their prized Delahaye at Pebble Beach, but a custom roadster lifts their spirits and tempts their pocket books. Back at the Guild, Ken runs into trouble on a '51 Ford F1.

2.title: Farm Boy
2.plot: While Brad and Barry investigate the vintage "anything goes" race cars of the Can Am series, Dave surprises Larry with his latest purchase, a 1978 Custom Bronco, before setting off on a mission to secure a replacement part for his 1946 Johnny Popper.

3.title: Spring Cleaning
3.plot: Larry's favorite Studebaker makes one last pit stop at the Guild, before being shipped off to a new owner. And while Brad troubleshoots an overheating problem on a Ferrari 328 GTS, Dave decides to auction off two decades of car memorabilia.

4.title: Alfa Dogs
4.plot: On an auction hunt in California, Dave and Larry are spellbound by a 1971 Alfa Montreal. As the bidding price skyrockets, will they go for broke or hit the brakes? While the boss is away, Thomas puts the finishing touches on a 1963 Split Window Corvette.

5.title: High and Mighty
5.plot: Dave showcases the Guild's 1935 Bugatti Aerolithe Coupe at the world's greatest aviation celebration in Osk Kosh, Wisconsin, alongside the 100P, the only plane Ettore Bugatti ever built. Back at the Guild, a 1965 Buick Riviera Gran Sport rolls in.

6.title: Hot Wheels, Hot Deals
6.plot: Dave is willing to drop big bucks on an eclectic mix of cars at a local auction, including a 2003 Aston Martin Vanquish and a 1958 Dodge C-Series half-ton. Back at The Guild, things go south when Larry borrows the boss' beloved 1958 Power Wagon.

7.title: Full Circles
7.plot: Dave's hot new ride, a 2016 Alfa 4C Competizione, gets put to the test when Janice challenges him to a race in her 2006 Lotus Elise. Back at the garage, Ron and Lary try their best to fire up the stubborn rotary engine of a 1966 NSU-RO-80.

8.title: Running on Fumes
8.plot: Dave tasks newbie mechanics with installing the engine of his 1949 Willys-Overland Jeepster, while getting his hands dirty on a carburetor rebuild of his 1983 Series III Land Rover. Meanwhile, Larry gets rattled by a 1974 E-Type Jaguar.

9.title: A Cord Accord
9.plot: Dave's investment partner, Larry, is having transmission problems with his prize new possession, a 1937 Cord 812, but a look under the hood reveals even more issues. Meanwhile, Ken swaps the brake system on a 1948 Dodge Pickup.

10.title: Built for Speed
10.plot: Dave is living la dolce vita in Italy where he gets an exclusive look at the SCG003 hyper-car. Meanwhile, Ron and Larry troubleshoot an oil issue on a 1966 Shelby with 100km's to its name.

11.title: Along Came a Spyder
11.plot: Dave unveils the Guild's next big restoration, a 1966 Ferrari 250 GT California Spyder. Billy gets a crash course on traditional panel beating while Dave returns to Italy to learn about Italian Coachbuilding.

12.title: Storage Treasures
12.plot: Dave lets go off a few oddities he's kept hidden in storage: his 1929 Schneider needs custom upholstery, his 1970s Volkswagen Beetle needs to fired up and his 1959 Borgward Isabella bought sight unseen over the internet may be a lemon.

5.title: Wheeling & Dealing
5.plot: When David takes Alex to Hershey to learn the ropes about the Concours, the timing couldn't be worse. The Bugatti boys are working against the clock to finish the Aerolithe before the owner sees it, but the pressure doesn't stop there. Paul pulls together the grease monkeys and body shop boys to get a '66 pimped-up Oldsmobile Toronado out the door for a client who wants it pronto.

4.title: The Guild Way
4.plot: There's a new guy in the body shop, and tempers flare because he won't do things "The Guild Way". Ian wants to get his hands on the Dodge Superbee, but the bosses' nightmare Chevy Apache truck keeps getting in his way. And when a toy Packard shows up, this little gem proves that big problems come in small packages.

5.title: It's Alive!
5.plot:

7.title: Car Love
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Race to the Finish
8.plot: It's the final countdown for the world's famous automobile Concours show in Pebble Beach, California. The Guild guys race to get the multi million dollar Alpha Romeo and Delahaye ready to roll. At Pebble Beach, David sips champagne with the one--percenters, while the Restorers gun for maximum destruction at a gloves--off demolition derby.

imdb.plot outline: It's all about shop floor drama, gas fueled egos, and millions of dollars at stake. An oil drenched, history soaked, paint splattered garage where the dreams of lofty aficionados and grease monkey gear-heads meet. Car restoration and customization is a multi billion dollar industry worldwide. And everybody who brings their car to the Guild has the same dream. Whether it's a rare vintage Lancia, in for a complete restoration or a '67 Chevy booked for "go faster" stripes, every driver wants to be behind that wheel as soon as possible and turn every head on the road. But running such a specialized and demanding business isn't always smooth sailing, or driving...
